mapper.insert: insert into Q_member(no, email, password, last_name, first_name, birth, gender, email_receive, country, city, question, answer) values(NEXTVAL('Q_member_no'), #{email}, #{password}, #{lastName},#{firstName}, to_date(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{gender}, #{emailReceive}, #{country}, #{city}, #{question}, #{answer})
mapper.update: update Q_member set email =#{no}, password =' ', last_name =' ' , first_name =' ', birth =null, gender =null ,email_receive =null, country =null, city =null, question =' ', answer =' ', type=' ', rest =null, ban = null, reg_date = null, last_date =null, profile_img = null, report_cnt = null where no= #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into Q_LEAVED(member_no, reason_select, reason_input) values(#{memberNo}, #{reasonSelect}, #{reasonInput})
insert into Q_DIRECTORY(no, NAME, MEMBER_NO) values(NEXTVAL('Q_DIRECTORY_NO'), '나의 첫 폴더', CURRVAL('Q_MEMBER_NO'))
mapper.select: select no, name, MEMBER_NO as memberNo, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh-mi') regDate from Q_DIRECTORY where MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } ORDER BY regDate DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Q_DIRECTORY WHERE no = #{ no }
mapper.select: SELECT keyword, COUNT(keyword) as cnt FROM Q_KEYWORDS GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY cnt DESC Limit 30
